SETUP: : sindrekongs will play as USSR.
brown_town will play as USA.
Handicap influence: US +2
Scenario: Standard
Optional Cards Added
Time per Player: 45 Minutes
USSR +1 in East Germany [0][4]
USSR +4 in Poland [0][4]
USSR +1 in Austria [0][1]
US +4 in West Germany [4][0]
US +4 in Italy [4][0]
US +1 in Iran [2][0]

Turn 1, Headline Phase: Socialist Governments & Captured Nazi Scientist*: USSR Headlines Socialist Governments
US Headlines Captured Nazi Scientist*
Event: Socialist Governments
US -1 in UK [4][0]
US -2 in West Germany [2][0]

Event: Captured Nazi Scientist*
US advances to 1 in the Space Race.
US gains 2 VP. Score is US 2.


Turn 1, USSR AR1: Duck and Cover: Event: Duck and Cover
DEFCON degrades to 4
US gains 1 VP. Score is US 3.

Coup (3 Ops):
Target: Iran
FAILURE: 1 [ + 3 - 2x2 = 0 ]
USSR Military Ops to 3
DEFCON degrades to 3
